articles.author: Isabel Keane, Caitlin Doornbos
articles.title: North Korea has ignored outreach about US soldier who defected across border as his current condition, location remain unknown - New York Post
articles.description: North Korea has not replied to US attempts to discuss the fate of an American soldier who defected to the hermit kingdom Tuesday by running across the border in a possible attempt to evade going on…
articles.content: North Korea has not replied to US attempts to discuss the fate of an American soldier who defected to the hermit kingdom by running across the border in a possible attempt to evade an assault trial, … [+4154 chars]
